page.title: 02The Hamlets are Shrinking!
page.content: The population of our area has been falling in recent years.For example,at Langford the{population was 163 in {1971 but fell to 136 in 1981.} However,Last year four babies were born in the village and this year so far,three more have been born (up to June).In the past ten years,only one new house has been built in Langford. At Ulting the population is down to 132.The northern part of Woodham Walter falls in our area and a new estate of houses has bought people into the area but only three new houses have been built in the past four years and the village is no longer growing.The other hamlet is Curling Tye Green and two families have moved into the area in the past year and restored old farmworkers cottages.
